extendedInfo.description: The world is in danger and only you can save it! You must eliminate all kind of creatures with many different weapons. Use grenades, machine guns, shotguns and napalm among many other weapons to complete all the levels. In ApocaMonster you have this: Â· Zombies, demons, evil clowns and many other monstruous creatures. Â· Rifles, shotguns, machine guns, grenades, bombardments and many other weapons. Â· Huge final level bosses you'll have to defeat. Â· Darkness, blood and magic artifacts. Â· Congas! Â· 4 worlds and 80 levels. Â· Intense action and massacre combined with skill levels. Â· An accurate and practical control system, with a left handed mode included. Â· And much more! Enjoy this zombie shooter for free!

reviews.title: Amazing but....
reviews.comment: Really disapointed the joy stick keeps crashing making me unable to move the crosshair and shoot the evil zombie b*#\302\243@#ds, other than that amazing game and i will 5* it as soon as running well :D
reviews.author: Richy Roo

reviews.title: Very fun
reviews.comment: Would recommend this to everyone. Truly free game. Dont take long to make money.
reviews.author: Jay Emmons-Caver

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Itz fun but only 4* kuz it\'z repetative...Mp
